bibl.title: Three Date-Palm Receipts from Elephantine/Syene.
bibl.note: I. Two Receipts for Survey-Tax (gevmetrâ‚¬a): (A) O. Berol. Inv. 25473 (Wilcken Collection). Syene, A.D. 137-38; - (B) O. Berol. Inv. 25483 (Wilcken Collection). Syene, A.D. 160/1. - II. Receipt for the Price of the Produce of a Public Date-Palm. O. Berol. Inv. 25479 (Wilcken Collection). Elephantine?, time of Antoninus (138-161 A.D.). <geometria>
NELSON Carroll A., Three Date-Palm Receipts from Elephantine/Syene.
